nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, this Quarren lived on the ocean-wide planet of Mon Cala and participated in the Battle of Mon Cala.

During the Battle of Mon Cala, this Quarren took orders from the Representative of the Quarren people, Nossor Ri, being a Quarren warrior. By the time of the battle, the Separatist Karkarodon commander Riff Tamson had manipulated the Quarren into believing war against the Mon Calamari was the right decision. This Quarren fought the Mon Calamari alongside fellow Quarren and aqua droids.

During the battle, this soldier noticed the opportunity to attack Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker while the Jedi struck down another Quarren. This soldier succeeded in grabbing onto the distracted Jedi's diving helmet, incapacitating him for a few moments, while another Quarren soldier attacked him from the front. A few seconds later, however, Skywalker was finally able to stab this Quarren through the abdomen and, soon after, kill the other soldier. When this Quarren sank to the bottom of the ocean, he also dragged Skywalker's helmet off, causing the latter to suffocate until his Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, arrived and retrieved the helmet.
The soldier first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series season four episode Water War and was voiced by Phil LaMarr.
